EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! Step Forward Assessment Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Invitation to Assessment
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Associate__c},
Thank you for applying to Step Forward. We are pleased to tell you that you have been successful in your application and we would like to invite you to the first stage of our assessment event. We were very impressed with your application so congratulations on reaching this stage!
The assessment event is an opportunity fort us to get to know each other better and find out if Step Forward is the right programme for you. The details of your assessment are as follows:
Stage One
Date: Friday 21st August 2015 Time: 13:00 - 15:30 Please arrive: 12:45
Address: Tower Building, 11 York Rd, Lambeth, London SE1 7NX
Please confirm your attendance here by Thursday 20th August, by midday. If you do not confirm your attendance by the deadline we cannot guarantee that we can save you a space.
Stage two of the assessment will take place on the same day. We will be inviting everyone to interview.
Stage Two
Date: Friday 21st August Time: 15:30 - 18:30
Please see below the forms of identification or certificates you need to bring, without these we will not be able to process your application any further:
Certificates of English and Maths GCSE (grade C and above)
or
Level 2 equivalent in English and Maths functional skills
AND
Full Birth certificate (This is the A4 version)
or
A British/EU passport
or
A UK driving licence or provisional
If you have any queries in the meantime please contact step.forward@the-challenge.org with ‘Step Forward Assessment’ in the subject title or call 0203 542 2404, and choose option 5.
Well done once again for reaching this stage, we look forward to meeting you.
----------------------------------------------------
Important information about the assessment:
Please come dressed in formal, smartwear, as you would for a job interview.
Stage One: Friday 21st August
Teamwork activities Pathway activities.
Stage Two: Friday 21st August
Individual interviews
Best wishes,
The Step Forward Team
